name: Adeon
description: Adeon is a software solution for controlling GSM devices (GSM gates, relays, modules etc.) via SMS commands. It consists of two main parts â€“ Adeon mobile app available on Google Play and this library for embedded development kits. Adeon app allows users to create a list of GSM devices with predefined commands. These commands can be sent in form of SMS message to the target GSM device and thus control its behaviour, e.g. switch on / off a relay, open / close a gate, de/activate alarm etc. The library for Arduino provides user an API for receiving commands from the Adeon app.
